paper_abstract: This paper proposes a general framework to compare the strength of the dependence in survival models, as time changes, L e. given remaining lifetimes X, to compare the dependence of X given X > t, and X given X > s, where s > t. More precisely, analytical results will be obtained in the case the survival copula of X is either Archimedean or a distorted copula. The case of a frailty based model will also be discussed in details.
paper_title: DYNAMIC DEPENDENCE ORDERING FOR ARCHIMEDEAN COPULAS AND DISTORTED COPULAS
